### [Initializers](/documentation/SwiftUI/Edge/Corner/Style/ExpressibleByFloatLiteral-Implementations#Initializers)

[`init(floatLiteral: Edge.Corner.Style.FloatLiteralType)`](/documentation/swiftui/edge/corner/style/init(floatliteral:))Create a fixed corner style with a float value as its corner radius. This is a shorthand of writing `.fixed(value)`.
